title: How Can i play on other servers without high ping?
body:
I am an EUW player living in London. at my uni i get 16 ms, constant, does not change at all, at home i get 30 ms, with the odd spike sometimes, so all in all i have good ping. i also have an account in Russia with 30 ms. However when i try to play on NA or Japan servers i get 200ms. Now obviously there is distance, however, i have seen streamers, typically pro's play on other servers just fine, for e.g. faker playing on EUW and NA or NA players playing on Korean servers.
is there a way to play on these servers without getting insanely high ping?

replies.body:
There could be a few factors impacting your ping on different servers.  One would be the physical distance but your ISP could also be taking a long route from your location to our game servers, and making it longer to hold a steady connection.  

If you want to play on NA from EUW, you're going to have higher ping but you can at least make sure it's as strong as it can be.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network strength, but you can't exceed that physical distance.

Players reaching servers from different continents are highly susceptible to ping issues, no matter who they are.  Let me know if that clears things up!
